FusionEngine::ShipResource

FusionEngine::ShipResource Class Reference

Stores information loaded from a ship package. More...

#include <FusionShipResource.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Stores information loaded from a ship package.

Loaded information includes

  • Engine and weapon positions (CL_Point-s)
  • Destructable 'Body' image (the main part of the ship)
  • CL_Surfaces for engines and weapons, and other accessories.

Remarks:
This resource has slightly varing uses on the client and server (or rather, more specific uses.) On the client it is used to define the positions of scene nodes and give FusionDrawableObject-s something to draw. On the server they are used to initilise FusionServerShip-s.
